languages.text: "Согласно подсчетам переданной с "Бессердечного" десятины, Администратум недосчитался трех единиц объема. Гипотетически, Вольный Торговец не рискнул{mf||а} изъять больше в присутствии проктора, но даже отсутствие одной унции делает десятину неполной".

"According to the calculation of the tithe transferred from the Heartless, the Administratum was short three units of volume. It is presumed that the Rogue Trader did not risk seizing more in the presence of the Proctor, but even one ounce unaccounted for makes the tithe incomplete."
languages.original_text: "Согласно подсчетам переданной с "Бессердечного" десятины, Администратум недосчитался трех единиц объема. Гипотетически, Вольный Торговец не рискнул{mf||а} изъять больше в присутствии проктора, но даже отсутствие одной унции делает десятину неполной".

traits.locale_text: "According to the calculation of the tithe transferred from the Heartless, the Administratum was short three standardised units of volume. It is presumed that the Rogue Trader did not risk seizing more in the presence of the Proctor, but even one ounce unaccounted for makes the tithe incomplete."

"According to the calculation of the tithe transferred from the Heartless, the Administratum was short three standardised units of volume. It is presumed that the Rogue Trader did not risk seizing more in the presence of the Proctor, but even one ounce unaccounted for makes the tithe incomplete."

"According to the calculation of the tithe transferred from the Heartless, the Administratum was short three standardised units of volume. It is presumed that the Rogue Trader did not risk seizing more in the presence of the Proctor, but even one ounce unaccounted for makes the tithe incomplete."

"According to the calculation of the tithe transferred from the Heartless, the Administratum was short three units of volume. It is presumed that the Rogue Trader did not risk seizing more in the presence of the Proctor, but even one ounce unaccounted for makes the tithe incomplete."

"According to the calculation of the tithe transferred from the Heartless, the Administratum was short three units of volume. It is presumed that the Rogue Trader did not risk seizing more in the presence of the Proctor, but even one ounce unaccounted for makes the tithe incomplete."

"According to the calculation of the tithe transferred from the Heartless, the Administratum was short three units of volume. It is presumed that the Rogue Trader did not risk seizing more in the presence of the Proctor, but even one ounce unaccounted for makes the tithe incomplete."

languages.text: "Basierend auf der Berechnung des von der Heartless transferierten Zehnts fehlen dem Administratum drei Volumeneinheiten. Vermutlich wollte {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} nicht riskieren, in Gegenwart des Proktors noch mehr zu entwenden, aber selbst mit nur einer fehlenden Unze ist der Zehnt unvollständig."
languages.original_text: "According to the calculation of the tithe transferred from the Heartless, the Administratum was short three units of volume. It is presumed that the Rogue Trader did not risk seizing more in the presence of the Proctor, but even one ounce unaccounted for makes the tithe incomplete."

traits.locale_text: "Basierend auf der Berechnung des von der Heartless transferierten Zehnts fehlen dem Administratum drei Volumeneinheiten. Vermutlich wollte {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} nicht riskieren, in Gegenwart des Proktors noch mehr zu entwenden, aber selbst mit nur einer fehlenden Unze ist der Zehnt unvollständig."

"Basierend auf der Berechnung des von der Heartless transferierten Zehnts fehlen dem Administratum drei standardisierte Volumeneinheiten. Vermutlich wollte {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} nicht riskieren, in Gegenwart des Proktors noch mehr zu entwenden, aber selbst mit nur einer fehlenden Unze ist der Zehnt unvollständig."

languages.text: « D'après les calculs de la dîme transférée depuis le Sans-Cœur, l'Administratum a enregistré une perte de trois unités de volume. On suppose que {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} n'a pas osé s'emparer de plus en présence du proctor, mais une seule once manquante suffit à rendre la dîme incomplète. »
languages.original_text: "According to the calculation of the tithe transferred from the Heartless, the Administratum was short three units of volume. It is presumed that the Rogue Trader did not risk seizing more in the presence of the Proctor, but even one ounce unaccounted for makes the tithe incomplete."

traits.locale_text: « D'après les calculs de la dîme transférée depuis le Sans-Cœur, l'Administratum a enregistré une perte de trois unités de volume standardisées. On suppose que {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} n'a pas osé s'emparer de plus en présence du proctor, mais une seule once manquante suffit à rendre la dîme incomplète. »

« D'après les calculs de la dîme transférée depuis le Sans-Cœur, l'Administratum a enregistré une perte de trois unités de volume standardisées. On suppose que {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} n'a pas osé s'emparer de plus en présence du proctor, mais une seule once manquante suffit à rendre la dîme incomplète. »

languages.text: “根据‘无心号’转移的什一税总量的计算结果，内政部还有三个单位的税额尚未收到。根据推测，行商浪人在监察官在场的情况下，未敢挪用更多什一税资源。不过，哪怕仅仅是一盎司的资源没有记录在案，也应当视为什一税资源缺失。”
languages.original_text: "According to the calculation of the tithe transferred from the Heartless, the Administratum was short three units of volume. It is presumed that the Rogue Trader did not risk seizing more in the presence of the Proctor, but even one ounce unaccounted for makes the tithe incomplete."

traits.locale_text: “根据‘无心号’转移的什一税总量的计算结果，内政部还有三个单位的税额尚未收到。根据推测，行商浪人在监察官在场的情况下，未敢挪用更多什一税资源。不过，哪怕仅仅是一盎司的资源没有记录在案，也应当视为什一税资源缺失。”
“根据‘无心号’转移的什一税总量的计算结果，内政部还有三个标准单位体积的税额尚未收到。根据推测，行商浪人在监察官在场的情况下，未敢挪用更多什一税资源。不过，哪怕仅仅是一盎司的资源没有记录在案，也应当视为什一税资源缺失。”

languages.text: «De acuerdo con los cálculos del diezmo transferido desde la Desalmada, al Administratum le faltaban tres unidades de volumen. Se presume que {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente no se arriesgó a robar más en presencia del Procurador, pero la más mínima ausencia hace que el diezmo esté incompleto».
languages.original_text: "According to the calculation of the tithe transferred from the Heartless, the Administratum was short three units of volume. It is presumed that the Rogue Trader did not risk seizing more in the presence of the Proctor, but even one ounce unaccounted for makes the tithe incomplete."

traits.locale_text: «De acuerdo con los cálculos del diezmo transferido desde la Desalmada, al Administratum le faltaban tres unidades estandarizadas de volumen. Se presume que {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente no se arriesgó a robar más en presencia del Procurador, pero la más mínima ausencia hace que el diezmo esté incompleto».

languages.text: 「ハートレスから移送された租税の計算によれば、帝国行政局は3ユニット分の不足がありました。ローグトレーダーは代理人の立会いがあったため、リスクを取って多くを奪おうとはしなかったと推測されます。ですが、たとえ1オンスでも帳簿に合わない分があれば、租税は不完全と見なされます」
languages.original_text: "According to the calculation of the tithe transferred from the Heartless, the Administratum was short three units of volume. It is presumed that the Rogue Trader did not risk seizing more in the presence of the Proctor, but even one ounce unaccounted for makes the tithe incomplete."

traits.locale_text: 「ハートレスから移送された租税の計算によれば、帝国行政局は標準単位で3ユニット分の不足がありました。ローグトレーダーは代理人の立会いがあったため、リスクを取って多くを奪おうとはしなかったと推測されます。ですが、たとえ1オンスでも帳簿に合わない分があれば、租税は不完全と見なされます」
「ハートレスから移送された租税の計算によれば、帝国行政局は標準単位で3ユニット分の不足がありました。ローグトレーダーは代理人の立会いがあったため、リスクを取って多くを奪おうとはしなかったと推測されます。ですが、たとえ1オンスでも帳簿に合わない分があれば、租税は不完全と見なされます」

languages.text: "Taşkalp'ten nakledilen aşarın hesaplamaları sonucunda Administratum'a ulaşan hacimde üç birimlik açık tespit edilmiştir. Hür Tacir'in, Üsteğmen'in gözü önünde daha fazlasını almaya cesaret edemediği düşünülmektedir. Ancak zerresinin dahi eksilmesi, aşarın bütünlüğünü bozmaya yeterlidir."
languages.original_text: "According to the calculation of the tithe transferred from the Heartless, the Administratum was short three units of volume. It is presumed that the Rogue Trader did not risk seizing more in the presence of the Proctor, but even one ounce unaccounted for makes the tithe incomplete."

traits.locale_text: "Taşkalp'ten nakledilen aşarın hesaplamaları sonucunda Administratum'a ulaşan hacimde üç birimlik açık tespit edilmiştir. Hür Tacir'in, Üsteğmen'in gözü önünde daha fazlasını almaya cesaret edemediği düşünülmektedir. Ancak zerresinin dahi eksilmesi, aşarın bütünlüğünü bozmaya yeterlidir."

"Taşkalp'ten nakledilen aşarın hesaplamaları sonucunda Administratum'a ulaşan hacimde üç standart birimlik açık tespit edilmiştir. Hür Tacir'in; Üsteğmen'in gözü önünde daha fazlasını almaya cesaret edemediği düşünülmektedir. Ancak zerresinin dahi eksilmesi, aşarın bütünlüğünü bozmaya yeterlidir."
